first_translate: it’s so cold!
l-lady fiona! please focus on your watch!
what if monsters come while you’re distracted like that? what will we do then?!
oh...
this is his first time out here as a soldier, right?
his name was allen or something.
don’t worry about me.
I’m focusing just fine.
haa... hah...

hangle: 내가 발견하지 않았으면 큰일 났을 거예요.
first_translate: if I hadn’t noticed them earlier, things would’ve been bad for us.
don’t worry about me.
let’s take our surroundings into account first.
the moment you let your guard down, you’ll become dinner for those monsters.
uhh...
mm...
oops, he seems more scared than expected.
should I try comforting him?
try not to get too nervous.

hangle: 그런 일이 없도록 지켜 주기 위해서
first_translate: that’s why I came along today--
to make sure nothing happens to you.
now, shall we work together?
l-la-- lady fiona...!!
f-fio--
fiona...!!
eek!
aargh?!
it’s a monster head!!!
sigh... really now.
all my efforts at trying to comfort him were for naught.
come on, don’t forget this kid is still new around here.

hangle: 좀 더 신경을 써줘야 하는 거 알잖아.
first_translate: you need to look after him better.
hmph.

hangle: 멍하니 있지 말고 피했으면 될 일이야.
first_translate: then maybe he shouldn’t have stood there frozen stiff instead of dodging.

hangle: 시그렌… 예전엔 예쁘장한 느낌이 남아 있었는데.
first_translate: siegren used to give off such a pretty boy vibe before,

hangle: 이제는 이런 잔혹한 풍경에 서 있는데도,
first_translate: but even when standing amidst all these gruesome scenes,
well... rather than being scary,
for some reason, it suits him quite well---
siegren.
he’s turned into one sharp-looking young man.
why are you looking at me like that?
isn’t he over puberty yet?
and he’s already nineteen years old!
“yet”? “over”?
when you scare someone, you gotta apologize afterward.
abel told you to train the newbie properly.

hangle: 고작 이 정도로 놀라면 곤란한 건 이쪽이지.
first_translate: if they can’t handle this much, how am I supposed to trust them during real battles?
this is only...
...the beginning.
we’re dead...
siegren...!
what?

hangle: 아벨이 평소에 다른 사람들이랑 지내는데 큰 문제는 없었댔는데,
first_translate: according to abel, you usually get along with other people without any issues.
so why must you always act like this toward me?
give me a break.
everyone! no worries.
at first, I was exactly where you guys are right now!

hangle: 여러분도 곧 잘하실 수 있을 거예요!
first_translate: soon enough, you’ll also learn to fight well!
excuse me!! may I ask a question?!

hangle: 병, 병사들 중에 피오나 님을 호위할 사람을 뽑는다고 들었습니다!
first_translate: I-I heard that among the soldiers, you’d choose someone to escort you personally!

hangle: 저, 저도 신참이지만 열심히 하면 뽑힐까요?!
first_translate: i-if I work hard despite being a rookie myself, could I possibly qualify?!
talk about unexpected questions...!
oh!
my escorts are veterans,

hangle: 신참 입장에서는 동경하게 되는 것도 무리는 아니지.
first_translate: so it makes sense that rookies might admire their position.
of course.
I’ll wait for you.
flash
flash
doing whatever she wants because everyone has eyes on her...
stop it already!
or else you’ll discourage the others again!
for some reason, I feel like siegren is becoming more and more like abel by the day...

hangle: 시그렌이 아벨을 닮아 가는 느낌이 든단 말이야…
first_translate: it’s already been five years since I arrived at airnwood.

hangle: 내가 헤일론에 온 후 벌써 5년이란 시간이 지났다.
first_translate: it won’t be long until the events from the original story begin.

hangle: 원작의 시작까지 얼마 남지 않았다는 뜻이다.
first_translate: right now, I’m eighteen years old.
as for siegren, he’s nineteen.
as for siegren, he’s nineteen.

hangle: 물론 몇 개월 뒤면 둘 다 한 살씩 더 먹을 예정이고.
first_translate: in several months, both of us will turn another year older.

hangle: 그동안 시그렌은 어린 시절의 다짐을 지켰다.
first_translate: up till now, siegren kept his childhood promise.

hangle: 원작의 흐름대로 아벨에게 검을 배우는 중이고,
first_translate: just like in the novel, he learned swordsmanship under abel,

hangle: 헤일론 성을 자유롭게 드나들 수 있는 위치에 올랐다.
first_translate: and rose up high enough to enter and leave airnwood castle freely.
while many fear siegren’s strength,

hangle: 그를 함부로 대하는 사람은 아무도 없었다.
first_translate: no one dares treat him carelessly anymore.
on my end, I worked diligently according to my initial life plan...

hangle: 즉 평화로운 삶을 이루기 위해 열심히 노력했다.
first_translate: ...in order to live a peaceful life.

hangle: 나는 성벽을 지키는 대가로 상당한 보수를 받았다.
first_translate: I received considerable compensation for protecting the city walls,

hangle: 마물의 재료를 판 돈도 꽤 많고.
first_translate: not to mention selling materials obtained from monsters brought in plenty of money.

hangle: 솔직히 평생 먹고살 걱정이 없을 정도다.
first_translate: to put it bluntly, I earned enough to last me a lifetime.
now, all I had left to do was see siegren meet eunice...

hangle: 주인공답게 황금 길을 걸어가는 모습만 확인하고,
first_translate: ...and walk the golden path as the protagonist.
be happy, dearie!
with that done, I planned to spend the rest of my days leisurely.
but...

hangle: 이 안락한 계획을 방해하는 사람이 있었으니…
first_translate: there happened to be someone who ruined my comfortable plans...
fiona,

hangle: 이전에 내가 한 제안에 대해서는 생각해봤느냐.
first_translate: have you thought through the offer I made previously?
about that...

hangle: 이 제안이 내 미래 계획을 방해하는 가장 큰 요소다….
first_translate: this proposal is the biggest obstacle hindering my future plans...
go ahead and call me father.
haa...

hangle: 그랬다. 아벨이 내게 최근에 한 제안은 바로
first_translate: yes, recently, abel asked me...
...if I wanted to become his adopted daughter.
I refuse.
can’t you think about it longer?

hangle: 하지만 제 인생 계획은 헤일론에 왔을 때부터 짜 놓은걸요.
first_translate: but I set my life goals ever since arriving at airnwood.

hangle: 시그렌을 결혼시키고 평화로운 곳에서 노후 생활을 보내야 해요.
first_translate: I need to marry off siegren and retire peacefully somewhere nice.
poor little siegren...
